body: Stable release based on the v7.0.0 Kotlin rewrite of the base library.

name: 3.0.0-rc01
body: This RC release is built upon the brand new Kotlin rewrite of the base library, specifically `v7.0.0-rc04` - see the base library releases [here](https://github.com/mikepenz/MaterialDrawer/releases). It includes some API and some implementation changes to track changes of the base library. It also features some API additions for things that were missing before.

- Updated base library to [6.1.1](https://github.com/mikepenz/MaterialDrawer/releases/tag/v6.1.1)
- Updated Kotlin version to 1.2.71
- Updated Android Gradle plugin to 3.2.0
- Updated build tools to 28.0.3

name: 2.0.0 - first AndroidX release
body:
This is the first AndroidX release of the library! If you're not using AndroidX, stick to 1.x versions.

Changes:
- Updated to AndroidX 1.0.0 dependencies
- Updated to 6.1.0 of the base library

name: 1.3.7 - last non-androidx release
body:
***This is the last release of the library that depends on the old support libraries, newer releases will be using androidx, just like the base library.***

Changes in this version:
- [attachItem fixes](https://github.com/zsmb13/MaterialDrawerKt/commit/fd957d4aaf39ddcb12a81e2068187cccaf932539) (slightly related: #73)
- Kotlin version updated to 1.2.70
- Support library version updated to 28.0.0
- Build tools updated to 28.0.2

Gradle dependencies to use this version:

```groovy
implementation 'co.zsmb:materialdrawer-kt:1.3.7'

// required support libraries
implementation "com.android.support:appcompat-v7:${versions.supportLib}"
implementation "com.android.support:recyclerview-v7:${versions.supportLib}"
implementation "com.android.support:support-annotations:${versions.supportLib}"
implementation "com.android.support:design:${versions.supportLib}"
```

- Update to base library version 6.0.9
- Updated Kotlin version to 1.2.51
- (Updated publishing and CI scripts)

- Update to base library version 6.0.8

- Builder property visibility fix (#71)
- Kotlin stdlib dependency fix (#69 )

- Updated support library to 27.1.1
- Updated Kotlin version to 1.2.50
- Updated Android Gradle plugin to 3.1.3

- Update to base library version [6.0.7](https://github.com/mikepenz/MaterialDrawer/releases/tag/v6.0.7)
- Updated support library to [27.1.0](https://developer.android.com/topic/libraries/support-library/revisions.html#27-1-0)
- Updated Kotlin version to 1.2.31
- Updated Gradle version to 4.6
- Updated Android Gradle plugin to 3.1.0
- Update to base library version [6.0.6](https://github.com/mikepenz/MaterialDrawer/releases/tag/v6.0.6)
- Update to base library version [6.0.5](https://github.com/mikepenz/MaterialDrawer/releases/tag/v6.0.5)
- Hotfix update to base library version [6.0.4](https://github.com/mikepenz/MaterialDrawer/releases/tag/v6.0.4)

After some inactivity since last year, here's another update! Let's see what's included.

### Internal improvements and small breaking changes
This section is only relevant if you've been extending this DSL to use it with your own custom drawer items. 

The `build` method of the drawer items is now in their base class (`AbstractDrawerItemKt`), and has `internal` visibility. The builder classes (ending in `Kt` also now take a generic parameter which is the type of the item that they can build. This greatly decreases the number of repeated lines in the library's implementation, and makes creating DSL builders for new drawer items much shorter - for drawer items that don't introduce new properties, the builders are one liners now.

To replace your old code that relied on the aforementioned `build` method, you can use the generic `createItem` method instead (see [here](/library/src/main/java/co/zsmb/materialdrawerkt/Utils.kt)). To see an example of this upgrade, you can look at [this commit](https://github.com/zsmb13/MaterialDrawerKt/commit/c8490b43bdaedaf9894ff8047bc4e197ffe58eec),  specifically the `CustomPrimaryDrawerItemKt` or the `OverflowMenuDrawerItemKt` class.

### Version updates
As always, this update has some version bumps to the latest versions of various dependencies.
- Base library version updated to [6.0.3]() (see the release notes there to see what's new)
- Kotlin version updated to 1.2.21
- Support library updated to 27.0.2
- Gradle plugin updated to 3.0.1

### Other improvements
- Some code formatting and improvements to match the official [coding conventions for libraries](https://kotlinlang.org/docs/reference/coding-conventions.html#coding-conventions-for-libraries)
- The sample app now supports [adaptive icons](https://developer.android.com/guide/practices/ui_guidelines/icon_design_adaptive.html)

- Updated base library to [6.0.2](https://github.com/mikepenz/MaterialDrawer/releases/tag/v6.0.2)
- Updated support library to [27.0.1](https://developer.android.com/topic/libraries/support-library/revisions.html#27-0-1)
- Updated Kotlin version to [1.1.60](https://blog.jetbrains.com/kotlin/2017/11/kotlin-1-1-60-is-out/)
- Updated Gradle wrapper to 4.3.1
- Updated base library version to [6.0.1](https://github.com/mikepenz/MaterialDrawer/releases/tag/v6.0.1)

🎃 Spooky Halloween update 👻

This release includes many version updates following up on Google's recent wave of releases as well as the [new major version](https://github.com/mikepenz/MaterialDrawer/releases/tag/v6.0.0) of the base library.

Important changes:
- The support libraries used by the library are now included as `implementation` details thanks to the new Gradle plugin, so you have to provide the necessary libraries yourself separately (see the [README](README.md) for details).
- API change: the `positionBasedStateManagement` of `DrawerBuilderKt` is now a deprecated no-op. The underlying `FastAdapter` class no longer has this option, so any calls to this should just be removed.

Boring changes:
- Sample app updated to use new library version as well as new Iconics packages

New versions of stuff in no particular order:
- Kotlin version 1.1.51
- Build tools 27.0.0
- Compile SDK 27
- Target SDK 27
- Support library 27.0.0
- Gradle plugin 3.0.0
- Gradle wrapper 4.1
- MaterialDrawer (base library) 6.0.0
- Fixed a nullability issue with click listeners (#59)

- Added image loading DSL (see the [readme](https://github.com/zsmb13/MaterialDrawerKt) for docs)
- Upgraded build tools version to 26.0.1
- Upgraded Kotlin version to [1.1.4-2](https://blog.jetbrains.com/kotlin/2017/08/kotlin-1-1-4-is-out/)

- Upgraded base library to [5.9.5](https://github.com/mikepenz/MaterialDrawer/releases/tag/v5.9.5)
- Removed application block from library manifest [#50](https://github.com/zsmb13/MaterialDrawerKt/pull/50)
- Target SDK upgraded to 26
- Build tools upgrade to 26.0.0
- Upgraded base library to [5.9.4](https://github.com/mikepenz/MaterialDrawer/releases/tag/v5.9.4)
- Upgraded base library to [5.9.3](https://github.com/mikepenz/MaterialDrawer/releases/tag/v5.9.3)

- Updated base library version to 5,9.2
- Exposed internal builders through `builder` properties
- Deprecated getters of non-readable properties so that they cause compile time errors instead of failing at runtime

Updated base library version to 5.9.1
Removed all usages of reflection
